summary: Four friends from the rough side of town grow apart when two are consumed by a life of crime, and the other two become FBI agents sent deep undercover - to bring down those childhood friends.
cast: Jeremy Ray Valdez|Walter Perez|Fernanda Romero|Will Rothhaar|Joseph Julian Soria|Will Estes|Jesse Borrego|Vivica A. Fox|Sean Patrick Flanery|Douglas Spain|Julio Cesar Cedillo|David J. title: Line of Duty
